reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two days before a wedding held in Julian. It was clean affordable and very comfortable. I liked the privacy of our patio right outside our room. The nearby road was not a problem at all. We enjoyed the Dudley's Bakery bread and juice as well as the small kitchenette. Comfortable bed and clean bathroom. We would stay there again. Bill was very nice.
reviews.title: Perfect!
Overbooked
reviews.text: I had email William Beckman, talked to Gina their daughter and wife Marsha, so I contacted several times, don't know how much I could have done but they lost my booking. I got there on a Friday night around 9pm and there were no more rooms. They did not even have me in there books. However, they did call around and found me a room at the Apple Tree Inn. So he was very helpful at helping me out. So word of caution, make sure you call the week off to verify that they still have your booking, it was very scary that night with no place to stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am giving them one star because the lost my booking after contacting them in email and talking to every member of the family!
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was really nice and a good value. The room was pretty, relaxing and very clean, the location beautiful, the proprietor friendly and accommodating, the continental breakfast absolutely fine. We had no problems at all and would love to go back.
reviews.title: Very nice bed and breakfast

reviews.text: We stayed one night as we were passing through Julian. The value here is excellent. Our room was spotlessly clean and comfortable. There was a small "kitchenette" with a sink and toaster, and the host supplied breakfast bread, jam, butter, cream cheese, yogurt and OJ for us.
reviews.title: Terrific
Too close to hwy 78. About 100 feet...
reviews.text: Too close to hwy 78. About 100 feet. bedroom Windows face hwy 78. On a Sunday night cars til midnight and started again early on Monday morning. Heater will drown this noise if you can sleep through a constant noise. Otherwise very quaint and clean and comfortable. Mike is very polite and knowledgable about hiking and the

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: outdoors. The low price makes it a value as a place to sleep.
reviews.title: A B&B that is exactly as advertised and more.
